briefdescription.para: Copy-construct from a 3x3 matrix and set the extra elements to identity.

memberdef.argsstring: (float v00, float v01, float v02, float v03, float v10, float v11, float v12, float v13, float v20, float v21, float v22, float v23, float v30, float v31, float v32, float v33) noexcept
memberdef.name: Matrix4

briefdescription.para: Assign from a 3x3 matrix. Set the extra elements to identity.
Test for equality with another matrix without epsilon.
Test for inequality with another matrix without epsilon.
Multiply a Vector3 which is assumed to represent position.
Set rotation elements from a 3x3 matrix.
Return the combined rotation and scaling matrix.
Return the rotation matrix with scaling removed.
Return the scaling part with the sign. Reference rotation matrix is required to avoid ambiguity.
Test for equality with another matrix with epsilon.
Return decomposition to translation, rotation and scale.
Return whether any element is NaN.
Return whether any element is Inf.
4x4 matrix for arbitrary linear transforms including projection.
